views.markdown:
v0.2.2 upgrade Preferences bundle v0.2.1
fix crash with Preferences
fix issue about option for Colored Icon
fix crash on specific iPhone 5s
v0.2-1
rewrite Preferences
add colored icon option for AppLauncher and LastApp

v0.2
improve compatibility with Auxo 2, MultitaskingGestures, AndroidLock XT
add Excepted apps feature for KillAllApps
add Unpaged feature
add app launching with bypassing passcode lock feature
fix some minor issues
v0.1-18
add double tap gesture in HomeButton
fix compatibility with Auxo 2
v0.1-15
fix flicker when using HomeButton QuickLaunch

v0.1-14
fix performance issue
fix some minor bugs

v0.1-13
fix "KeepSlowAnimationFactor" feature

v0.1-12
fix issues that HomeButton QuickLaunch is stuck
fix QuickLaunches visual issue in specific case
add lock sound during lock by LockButton QuickLaunch
add "keep slow animation factor" feature in InternalSettings
remove dependency of Flipswitch
some minor fix
v0.1-11
MultitaskingGestures compatibility

v0.1-10
add long press gesture at HomeButton QuickLaunch

v0.1-9
fix Preferences app crash on iPad
fix minor issues

v0.1-8
- fix minor issues

- loading external AppLauncher/Activator QuickLaunch icons

make folder in your device
"/Library/Application Support/CCToggles/ QuickLaunches/ (APP_BUNDLE_ID|ACTIVATOR_LISTENER_ID)/"
and put Icon files
"Icon.png" for non-Retina device
"Icon@2x.png" for Retina device

ex) stock Preferences app
put Icon.png and Icon@2x.png files in
/Library/Application Support/CCToggles/QuickLaunches/ com.apple.Preferences/

ex) Compose Tweet Activator action
/Library/Application Support/CCToggles/QuickLaunches /libactivator.twitter.compose-tweet/

v0.1-7
add option for hiding suppressed items in lockscreen
add option for scroll bounce
add option for starting page
add long press gesture for stock toggles
introduce LastApp Quicklaunch
add Spanish, Chinese (Traditional) locales
change landscape scroll direction
fix some issues

v0.1-6
fix Activator QuickLaunch issues
fix minor issues
add Italian locale
add Chinese (Simplified) locale

v0.1-5
add Activator QuickLaunch
improve AppLauncher QuickLaunch
- you can set "URLScheme" at each item
fix some issues

v0.1-4
fix QuickLaunch disappearing issue in specific device
fix landscape QuickLaunch issue on iPad
ad KillAllApps, ScreenShotter, Siri QuickLaunches
fix issues about Lockscreen (also passcode locked)
(as I know there is only one issue with AndroidLock XT)
fix crash with WiPi

Add Home button, Lock button QuickLaunch
Add PowerOff Toggle
Add Lockscreen restriction configuration
Add per-page configuration for landscape
fix Bluetooth toggle status issue on 7.0.4
fix compatibility issue with WiPi
Change respring/reboot english text
fix some minor bugs

add supports arm64 devices
